nodes.text: Felusia Stato was a female Human who lived during the Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. A merchant like her relatives Meridat, Nelva, and Clem, Felusia Stato sold furniture and decorations.

A Decorations vendor who can be placed in players' Strongholds, Felusia Stato was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the 2014 Digital Expansion Galactic Strongholds. She is identical to the vendor Nelva Stato, who is found on Carrick Station.
